snippet: The Music Academy in Chennai featured some of India’s most distinguished dancers, as well as ones on the ascendance.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews Music Academy Dance Festival in Chennai, India.
lead_paragraph: The Music Academy in Chennai featured some of India’s most distinguished dancers, as well as ones on the ascendance.

headline.print_headline: With Every Ankle’s Jingle, a Vibrant Blend of Grace and Precision
headline.seo: Music Academy in Chennai Hosts Indian Dance Festival
headline.main: With Every Ankle’s Jingle, a Vibrant Blend of Grace and Precision
